this is the first command sudo mount /dev/sda1 /mnt
open the terminal and use commands there, the pastebin I gave you was missing the /mnt at the end by accident
sudo grub-install --boot-directory=/mnt/boot /dev/sda   <--------------- /sdaX what is X
